website_summaries.verdict: Aiming to keep your foot protected and comfortable without stepping back from being a top-performing DC sneaker, the DC Gaveler delivers reliable support and stays breathable with its functional design. Despite being built for quality performance, it also showcases a simply attractive appearance that keeps you stylish throughout the day.
pros: A lot of the critics who shared their reviews about the DC Gaveler agree that it feels comfortable on feet
Many reviewers have family members who have always preferred DC sneakers and they are happy
One commenter mentions that he can wear the shoe on the treadmill and elliptical
As a low-top DC sneaker, this pair provides ankle support, according to a buyer
A good number of reviewers enjoy the excellent padding of the shoe
The DC Gaveler receives praise from buyers for the good support it offers the foot
Just like other DC sneakers, this pair is quite durable, a few consumers say
cons: The DC Gaveler fits too narrow, according to multiple reviewers who bought a pair

customer_reviews.title: Good looking pair of quality shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has loved the DC brand for years now. He is the hardest to shop for but when I saw this pair of the DC Gavelers, I just knew I had to get them. Great fit, true to size. Wears a 12 and fits true to a size 12. Great quality for the price!! Already know I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Heida

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously Small
customer_reviews.text: Seriously? Ordered a size larger and not even close. Even another half size or more would still be way too narrow. Too bad, the shoes look nice and appear to be relatively well made. Hey DC and other brands, if you’re going sell Chinese junk, at least try to have them made close to international standards and American sizes. Congrats, another logo down the tubes and yet another company I will never buy from.
customer_reviews.author: Paying Customer

customer_reviews.title: Creased!
customer_reviews.text: Never had a problem with any of the other DC shoes I bought off here, but this is the second pair of these in a row that have come creases like this.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Another great shoe from DC!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered these DC’s for myself and love them. They fit the same as my other DC’s, I usually wear the Court Graffik or Net. I really like the extra padding these shoes offer on the tongue and around the collar. Overall a very comfy fit, great color and solid price. 10/10 I’d buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Dad Bod

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: They were very nice quality but I ordered the wrong type of dc shoes so I had to return them. I wasn't aware that it was the globe that has that extra padding and that is what he had wanted. But these were very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderlust

customer_reviews.title: Loved them glad their still stocking them
customer_reviews.text: Amazing deal! I love DC shoes only problem their hard to come across due to their discontinued :( but Amazon always came through providing me with them they arrived on time and I'm very happy "Also a great deal"
customer_reviews.author: Venom

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he’s in heaven. He says it feels like there’s a cloud surrounding his foot. Even though they’re low cut it still gives him ankle support. He couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Runs 1/2 size small but AMAZING shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: These run slightly too small. My husband wears a 10.5 and I had to send them back and get an 11. Got the new ones and he said they fit perfect. He is so happy with them. Very comfortable and sturdy. Just what we would expect from DC shoes. He loves this brand and they do not dissapoint.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael at Nemera Bengals

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Comfortable. And fit perfect.. Colors are bright. Only wish the DC was stitched in
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Muth

customer_reviews.title: my teenage daughter loves...
customer_reviews.text: these shoes. and i only have to buy 2 pairs per year. Love the quality of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes not exactly happy about them coming in a half a size too small but oh well. Ordered 11.5w but received a 11.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, stylish, comfortable and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing DCs for over 2 decades now. They are super comfortable, stylish and affordable! Everything I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Irish_Pickle

customer_reviews.title: not for wide feet.lol
customer_reviews.text: i originally purchases a half size smaller because DC shoes are usually big, but the shoe was way too tight especially because the tongue of the shoes are thicker than normal. then i purchased a bigger size but realized that not only was the tongue still big, but the shoe is tight on the sides. Going to be returning both shoes an purchasing my regular DC styles.
customer_reviews.author: MontyPyro0704

customer_reviews.title: DC Rocks
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, had about a month now, everyday wear and still look brand new

customer_reviews.title: comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves them he says very comfortable , and the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria W.

customer_reviews.title: Decent skate shoe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn only DC sneakers for 13 years. First pair ever that didn’t fit as expected.. probably should have went a half size up. Other than that, great show, better value. I wear them mainly for skating.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Amazing as always
customer_reviews.text: My son ONLY wears DC shoes. These shoes are very well made and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe right out of the box. Flexible toes,long tongue, good looking. DC sows all the sidewalls on so you never have a split of the rubber from shoe making great durability. The other new DC's i bought lack the long tongue and flexibility that these do,and cost me more.
customer_reviews.author: Dichroman

customer_reviews.title: get what you pay 4
customer_reviews.text: great seller ,product well lasted 1 month but im hard on shoes

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with these. Delivery was late due to a massive snowstorm but other than that..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived sooner than expected! They fit perfectly, are super comfortable and look amazing!!! They were already laced up the way I prefer and for the price you cannot beat the deal they had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I'm a girl, yes, but prefer the men's style and love claiming i wear a smaller size! Lmao but they have elastic bands to keep the tongue in the right place. I phat lace mine and have no problem with them, will definitely buy again and recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Felicity White

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper DCs. Not as fluffy as you are used to.
customer_reviews.text: These are a lesser quality DC shoe. With printed DC on them and the inside a tad lacking. But they pass my test for comfort.

customer_reviews.title: Fit was to small !
customer_reviews.text: Not to true size. Order a larger size than your normal shoes. Excellent padding inside the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit great. Laces are a little short.. had to buy longer ones.. and the tongue of the shoe is very very thick! But they feel good and look good and if you have big feet they make them look smaller!

customer_reviews.title: So Chill
customer_reviews.text: So incredibly comfy. Wore them sun up to sun down. Great fit with extra padding on the ankles. Definitely getting another pair

customer_reviews.title: The sizes are True to fit
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my Grandson he likes the DCs it's the 2nd pair I have gotten for him

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: The only sneakers I buy! I love them, they are so comfortable, look sharp and last

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves DC shoes and everytime I buy them online it's cheaper and well worth it!

customer_reviews.title: FIT PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy they fit. They were a late christmas gift for my girlfriend. She loved them. Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in DC shoes
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit comfortably, really disappointed, bought a half size bigger just in case and still not good. Owned over 10 pairs of DCs in my life and this it's the first to not fit. Can't easily return as there is not a place to do it nearby.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes and the price. I'm cheap so that part. Lol

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait if “out of stock”
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the wait if they’re “out of stock. Shipped quickly. Exactly like description!

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes that are comfortable and fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: They're great shoes, there comfortable, and they fit great. Good price too. Plus speedy shipping its rare you find shoes this good. Definitely worth the price. Do yourself a favor and buy these shoes, you wont regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Got these for the matching sweatsuits that my husband and I had made! Always have and will live dc shoes and the way they last forever.

customer_reviews.title: The best shoe's ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand I buy & will continue to biy.

customer_reviews.title: support the back of heels for flat footed men
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable and for the price can’t beat it with a stick.and also avoid noisy stores and there lines

customer_reviews.title: Fast and affordable!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my hubby for Christmas! They were shipped fast and boxed nicely! He loved them!

customer_reviews.text: Wear these almost every day, super comfortable and they don’t get dirty easily which I like.

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Arrived pretty quickly and the shoes look amazing. Professional packaging and they fit exactly as expected

customer_reviews.title: Beat up box
customer_reviews.text: Box was beat all to hell when it arrived. Had to tape it back together just so i could wrap it as they are a Christmas gift.

customer_reviews.text: They are a bit more... round on the front than I thought they were but they are nice!

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING !
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to the DC brand. They are fantastic !

customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes i love them and fit just rite and delivery time was way sooner

customer_reviews.text: They fit great. Only thing is I wanted then wider, but that was my fault. But great shoes and arrived a day early.

product_meta.title: DC - Mens Gaveler Lowtop Shoes
product_meta.description: Kick flip into the season with the DC® Gaveler sneaker. Leather and textile upper. Lace-up closure. Round-toe design with brand logo detail throughout. Soft fabric lining and footbed. Rubber outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 1 lb Product measurements were taken using size 11, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
